scripts.build: rm -rf dog.clockwork.http && mkdir -p dog.clockwork.http/node_modules/@clockworkdog/cogs-client/dist/browser && cp index.html index.js cogs-plugin-manifest.json dog.clockwork.http && cp node_modules/@clockworkdog/cogs-client/dist/browser/index.js dog.clockwork.http/node_modules/@clockworkdog/cogs-client/dist/browser
